sourcesContent:
<template>
  <swiper :slidesPerView="6" :spaceBetween="10" :pagination="{
    clickable: true,
  }" :modules="modules">
   <swiper-slide sm="2">
      <v-sheet min-height="150" rounded="lg">
      </v-sheet>
    </swiper-slide>
  </swiper>
</template>
<script>
// Import Swiper Vue.js components
import { Swiper, SwiperSlide } from 'swiper/vue';

// Import Swiper styles
import 'swiper/css';

import 'swiper/css/pagination';

// import required modules
import { Pagination } from 'swiper';

export default {
  components: {
    Swiper,
    SwiperSlide,
  },
  setup() {
    return {
      modules: [Pagination],
    };
  },
};
</script>
